Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Enacts the New York emergency responder act
Summary: Enacts the New York emergency responder act limiting the liability of certain emergency responders.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to enacting the New York emergency responder act
